ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank Benoit Moury for information on the Chile 3 isolate. This research was part of, and funded by, the CGIAR Research Program on Roots, Tubers and Bananas (RTB) and supported by CGIAR trust fund contributors ( https://www.cgiar.org/funders/; 27 June 2019). Funding support was provided by Programa Nacional de InnovaciÏŒn Agraria (PNIA, contract 029-2015-INIA-PNIA/UPMSI/IE) from Peru. We are very grateful for technical support at CIP by Ana Perez and Pamela Chavez.
